description: Bournemouth news: Andoni Iraola talks with Guillem Balague
title: Bournemouth news: Andoni Iraola talks with Guillem Balague
title_page: Bournemouth news: Andoni Iraola talks with Guillem Balague - BBC Sport
maintext:
What would winning the FA Cup mean to Bournemouth? And how has Andoni Iraola inspired such a positive season?
The Bournemouth head coach sits down with Guillem Balague to talk through his career and his time at Vitality Stadium.
Before Sunday's FA Cup quarter-final against Manchester City, he explains how he prepares to face a side managed by Pep Guardiola.
